overview:
Gannon leads marketing for Ticketfly, the social ticketing platform.

Prior to Ticketfly, Gannon led a number of executive leadership positions. Most recently he served as executive vice president of global marketing for KIT digital (NASDAQ:KITD), the world’s leading provider of broadband TV solutions, where he successfully launched the company’s global brand and product lines from the technology assets of over ten acquired companies, and helped generate the awareness and demand to achieve a 45% global market share position. Before KIT digital, Gannon was the COO/CMO of Kyte, a leading multi-screen media publishing platform acquired by KIT digital in January of 2011, where he led product management, marketing, client services and operations.

Prior to Kyte, Gannon was a Principal at Horn Group, an award winning digital marketing and communications agency for technology companies. As head of the agency’s New York operation, Gannon was responsible for client strategy, business development and operations. Clients included WebEx (Cisco), Right Media (Yahoo!), ArcSight (HP), Demand Media, and many others.

Earlier in his career Gannon led Hall Consulting, a pioneering San Francisco web design and development consultancy that he founded in 1994.

An accomplished musician and entrepreneur, Gannon serves on the Board of Directors of San Francisco music and lifestyle brand Om Entertainment Group.
